_sText:
This map is so much fun it should be illegal!

No bars between the glass... Nowhere to hide!

30 different randomly occurring rounds mean it's more insanity every time you respawn as well as more than 1 secret room!

And as if that wasn't enough the map has both Coke and Pepsi venders so everyone can be happy

REQUIRED SETTINGS:

mp_freezetime 0 -- Needed to prevent some cases of instant death
sv_airacellerate 100 -- To enable surfing

TO FURTHER WHET YOUR APPETITE HERE ARE SOME OF THE CRAZY ROUNDS THIS MAP CONTAINS:

Earthquake Round -- Shooting someone during an earthquake IS as difficult as it sounds
Tornado Round -- Frantically try and get kills while avoiding the tornado which is tearing through the map
Crumbling Round -- That platform isn't as sturdy as it looked last round
Explosion Round -- Better buy those weapons quickly to avoid getting detonated!
Crush Round -- Its as if the map is shrinking! In fact its actually a ceiling descending on you
Spin Round -- Hold on to your lunch
Car Round -- Speed kills!
Zombie Round -- Its as if Left 4 Dead and Zombiemod had some sort of weird unkillable baby
Electricity Round -- Cowboy builders made this map and dodgy wiring never goes well with a pool of water

AND QUITE A FEW MORE

Please leave feedback if you liked the map or PM me if you find any problems/come up with any more round ideas ;)
